text: The Fernández Mañueco Government is the incumbent regional government of Castile and León led by President Alfonso Fernández. It was formed in July 2019 after the regional election. ==Government== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="font-size:90%; text-align:left;" |- ! scope=col|Name ! scope=col
